title: Ivanka Trump visits the Supreme Court | Fox News
text:
Ivanka Trump visits the Supreme Court 
By Ryan Lovelace Facebook 0 Twitter 0 Email Print 
Ivanka Trump, the president's daughter, made an appearance at the Supreme Court on Wednesday. Arabella & me at the Supreme Court today. I'm grateful for the opportunity to teach her about the judicial system in our country firsthand. pic.twitter.com/1YXHyZ9ADZ — Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 22, 2017 
Trump reportedly declined to answer questions but CNN reports she was attending the day's oral arguments as a guest of Justice Anthony Kennedy. Ivanka Trump at Scotus today happened to hear Important opinion on death penalty Guest of Justice Kennedy. pic.twitter.com/J0hrHjrWOX — Ariane de Vogue (@Arianedevogue) February 22, 2017 #SCOTUS Sketch: Ivanka visits the Supreme Court . . pic.twitter.com/QGRgQ6oYZp — Arthur Lien (@Courtartist) February 22, 2017 
Rumors of whether Kennedy might retire have swirled in recent months as Trump nominated Judge Neil Gorsuch to fill the vacancy created by the death of Antonin Scalia.
